alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 05 at 9:58PM PST until November 08 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...The Winter Weather Advisory for today will expire at 11pm. For the Sunday night through Monday night Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 19 inches and winds up to 50 mph possible. * WHERE...Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range. * WHEN...Winter Storm Watch, from late Sunday night through late Monday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range
